text: ONE DAY I WILL FIND THE RIGHT WORDS, AND THEY WILL BE SIMPLE 📖.
author: Jack Kerouac

text: LIFE ISN'T ABOUT FINDING YOURSELF. LIFE IS ABOUT CREATING YOURSELF🪞.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: A SINGLE DREAM IS MORE POWERFUL THAN A THOUSAND REALITIES 🌸.
author: J.R.R. TOLKIEN

text: ACCEPT WHO YOU ARE UNLESS YOU'RE A SERIAL KILLER 🔪🫣.
author: Ellen Degeneres

text: SUCCESS IS A DECISION. IF YOU WANT IT WORK FOR IT 🦢.
author: Unknown

text: WHEN IT RAINS LOOK FOR RAINBOWS 🌈. WHEN ITS DARK LOOK FOR STARS ⭐.
author: Unknown

text: YOU MISS 100% OF THE SHOTS YOU DON'T TAKE 🏒.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: THE BEST WAY TO PREDICT THE FUTURE IS TO INVENT IT 💡.
author: Alan Kay

text: BELIEVE YOU CAN AND YOU'RE HALFWAY THERE 🏔️.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
